articles.author: Renata Brito, Barry Hatton
articles.title: Spain’s leader says a problem in the European power grid caused the Iberian outage - AP News
articles.description: A major power outage in Spain and Portugal has knocked out subway networks, traffic signals and ATMs. Spain’s Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez says a problem in the European grid that he described as an “oscillation” was behind the outage, but that the cause was …
articles.content: BARCELONA, Spain (AP) A blackout brought much of Spain and Portugal to a standstill Monday, halting subway and railway trains, cutting phone service and shutting down traffic lights and ATMs for mill… [+7715 chars]
